DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study assess insulin resistance impact sustain virological response patient hepatitis C treat Pegasys Copegus . Data collect patient 72 week treatment 24 week treatment-free follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study The Impact Insulin Resistance Sustained Virological Response Patients With Hepatitis C Treated With Pegasys ( Peginterferon Alfa-2a ) Copegus ( Ribavirin )
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Chronic hepatitis C ( detectable HCV RNA ) Initiation treatment Pegasys Copegus Participation clinical trial study
